title: App using SkiaSharp fails validation with error "libSkiaSharp contains incomplete bitcode"
body: Reported in Xamarin desk case: https://kb.xamarin.com/agent/case/362730 XS Version info, build output, and Application Loader logs are attached. [ApplicationLoaderViewLog.txt](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/389190/ApplicationLoaderViewLog.txt) [BuildOutput.txt](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/389191/BuildOutput.txt) [XS_Version_Info.txt](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/389192/XS_Version_Info.txt)
